interface.name: BinomialConfidenceInterval
interface.javadoc: Abstract base class to generate confidence intervals for a binomial proportion. Binomial proportion confidence interval (Wikipedia) $Id: BinomialConfidenceInterval.java 1560531 2014-01-22 22:00:37Z tn $ 3.3

Create a confidence interval for the true probability of success of an unknown binomial distribution with the given observed number of trials, successes and confidence level.

Preconditions:

  • {@code numberOfTrials} must be positive
  • {@code numberOfSuccesses} may not exceed {@code numberOfTrials}
  • {@code confidenceLevel} must be strictly between 0 and 1 (exclusive)

numberOfTrials number of trials numberOfSuccesses number of successes confidenceLevel desired probability that the true probability of success falls within the returned interval Confidence interval containing the probability of success with probability {@code confidenceLevel} NotStrictlyPositiveException if {@code numberOfTrials <= 0}. NotPositiveException if {@code numberOfSuccesses < 0}. NumberIsTooLargeException if {@code numberOfSuccesses > numberOfTrials}. OutOfRangeException if {@code confidenceLevel} is not in the interval {@code (0, 1)}.
